what_is_iptv.answer: IPTV (Internet Protocol Television) is a system where television content is delivered using Internet Protocol over a network infrastructure. With 4ksmartplay IPTV, you get access to thousands of channels, movies, and series in stunning 4K quality, delivered directly through your internet connection.

troubleshooting.answer:
Common streaming issues and solutions:

• **Buffering**: Check your internet speed (minimum 25 Mbps for 4K)
• **Connection problems**: Restart your device and router
• **App crashes**: Clear app cache or reinstall the IPTV app
• **No sound/video**: Check audio/video settings in the app

If problems persist, please contact our technical support team via WhatsApp.
